infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: The app needs access to your photo library to let you attach photos and videos to chat messages.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: The app needs access to your camera to let you take photos and videos to attach to chat messages.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to track attendance and monitor site geofencing during your shift.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need your location to track attendance and monitor site geofencing during your shift, even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need your location to track attendance and monitor site geofencing during your shift, even when the app is closed.
